title: The Queen's Proposal
subtle: Adventure (fiction), 1,584 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 910L, Fiction Series
description: The Hollow Kids series continues as Qynn, Uncle Jasper, Odie, and the cephaloid, Seth, discuss how to save their friends from the Queen. As a frustrated Qynn steps away, she begins to think about her friends-and something strange happens in the sands. How will Qynn, Jasper, Seth, and Odie fare in their first confrontation with the Queen? The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast and to make, revise, and confirm predictions.
